author: Vicky W
title: "Paolo" - our Saviour!
text: Paolo is our Saviour! My absent minded husband left his wallet which has all his ID credentials in the in-room safe and only realized on the last day of our trip after we left London. Although there was no record of lost and found when we called, after explaining the seriousness of the consequences that my husband cannot enter our home country, Paolo did the best he can to go into the room which was occupied by another guest at the time to check the safe and found it! I could not express in words the relief and contentment when received the amazing news from Paolo! What's more, at our request, he arranged to deliver the wallet to the airport on the day of our departure! We would like to express our hearty gratitude to Paolo for his genuine care and concern as he went out of his way to help us to retrieve the wallet. Thank you, thank you, thank you!
